body: At prima facie the manga may look like just another goofy ridiculous schiessepost.But boy was i caught unawares by the sheer ingenuity of this master storyteller. My only gripe with this soap opera would be those panels featuring the real photographs.Personally,i don't take kindly to cinematic works with 4th wall breakers.Which led me to ponder over the fifth wall in manga comics.Now the definition according to the general consensus is something along the lines of "when the script writer makes a reference to his old works". quite an unsatisfactory definition ,if you ask me.But i think within manga it's quite possible to break the fifth wall.Yep,by including real world images.
Hahaha wtf is this?? it's awesome
Ryuga ryuga this doujin is from taiwan
This is what happens when you nuke a country twice people...
